name: The Lure of the Gallows: Side Stories
name_original: The Lure of the Gallows: Side Stories
description:
Every tragedy has its innocent roots.

On the East Coast, a young Seer experiences a typical small-town upbringing, where their biggest worry is something as mundane as starting the first day of high school.

Across the country, a young Naturalist experiences something far more sinister...

(This is a collection of short stories based on the world of 'The Lure of the Gallows', an urban fantasy interactive fiction novel.)

  • Play as the Seer during their first day of high school... and meet the other half of your friend group for the first time.
  • Play as the Seer with Leo as you wish your mother a happy Mother's Day.
  • See life through Warren's eyes as he honors a yearly Mother's Day tradition with Eli.

[Note: These stories were originally posted as a Patreon special, and are officially archived here.]
